biography_text: SMITH, Adrian, a Representative from Nebraska; born in Scottsbluff, Scotts Bluff County, Nebr., December 19, 1970; graduated from Gering High School, Gering, Nebr., 1989; B.S., University of Nebraska, Lincoln, Nebr., 1993; business owner; education coordinator; member of the Gering, Nebr., city council, 1994-1998; member of the Nebraska state legislature, 1999-2007; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Tenth and to the six succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2007-present).
